text: Waaliwo ekisenge ekyebunguludde ebisenge eby’ebbali. Omubiri gw’ekisenge ekyo gwali mita bbiri n’ekitundu. Waaliwo ekibangirizi wakati w’ebisenge eby’ebbali ebya yeekaalu n’ekisenge ekyebunguludde ebisenge eby’ebbali ebya yeekaalu. Waaliwo n’ekibangirizi wakati wa bbugwe n’ekisenge ekyebunguludde ebisenge eby’ebbali ebya yeekaalu.
